name: HA-enoceanmqtt
description: This is a Home Assistant overlay for enoceanmqtt.
longDescription:
It allows to easily have access to EnOcean devices in Home Assistant through MQTT.
It is based on MQTT discovery from the Home Assistant MQTT integration.

de.description: Dies ist ein Home Assistant Overlay für enoceanmqtt.
de.longDescription:
Es ermöglicht den einfachen Zugriff auf EnOcean-Geräte im Home Assistant über MQTT.
Es basiert auf der MQTT-Erkennung der Home Assistant MQTT-Integration.

fr.longDescription:
Il permet d'accéder facilement aux appareils EnOcean dans Home Assistant via MQTT.
Il est basé sur la découverte MQTT à partir de l'intégration MQTT de Home Assistant.
fr.description: Il s'agit d'une superposition Home Assistant pour enoceanmqtt.

it.longDescription:
Consente di accedere facilmente ai dispositivi EnOcean in Home Assistant tramite MQTT.
Si basa sul rilevamento MQTT dall'integrazione MQTT di Home Assistant.
it.description: Si tratta di un overlay Home Assistant per enoceanmqtt.
